"My name is Phobia my dear, the scans I have are for the Maximals to 
view." He'd already stated his name but figured the sight of a 
Predicon must have startled her. "You are truly a beautiful creature, 
a beast mode that seems to fit your beautiful spark."

Complementing a Maximal put a bad taste in his mouth, he knew that 
these weren't friends, only temporary interests to get his job done. 
One day they would be enemies again and he knew all to well not to 
make friends. One day he would have the order to delete them.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Savanna:;
> She transformed into lioness mode and walked up to Phobia. "I don't 
> understand. Who is this message for? All Maximals? And then, why 
this 
> message?"  She looked at the other two bot. She noddd to them.
> "I am Savanna.  I still don't know who you are?"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Phobia slowly descended the ramp looking back and fourth between 
> the 
> > four Maximals "I note that I haven't been reduced to slag
> (Destroyed, 
> > not turned into a dinobot) I have come a long way to deliver a 
> > critical message to you." Phobia displayed a confident expression 
> on 
> > his face,"I have here, (Holds up box.)copies of every scan taken 
> > since my arrival." Phobias eyes lock on the box,"Now if we could 
> > proceed to your base, We'll begin"(The scans don't include what 
his 
> > babies learned from Magmatron.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > ::Savanna::
> > > 
> > > She keeps her distance from the other bots.  She is wary of the 
> > > strange bots that had arrived.  She spoke into her comlink.
> > > "Phobia, I am Savanna. What is your situation and what do you 
> need 
> > > assistance with?"  She looked at the other bots.  She took a 
few 
> > > steps closer to them so that they might see her, but left 
enough 
> > room 
> > > for her to mauver incase of attack.  She let out a soft growl 
> from 
> > > her throat.  Her lion side made her want to pounce first and 
ask 
> > > questions later.  But she kept her distance.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > (A regular wizard of oz scenario cowardly lion included.) 
> > > > 
> > > > Phobia check long distance scanners to make sure that only 4 
> bots 
> > > > were in the area before lowering his shields and shutting 
down 
> > his 
> > > > guns. (The guns wouldn't do any good if you approached from 
the 
> > > > side.)"I have shown you a gesture of trust, now do the same 
for 
> > me. 
> > > > transform to bot mode (IF not already in bot mode) and lower 
> your 
> > > > weapons to your sides. If you have optic blasters please 
> approach 
> > > > with them off line." 
> > > > 
> > > > (I know I'm taking liberties here just prease bear with me.) 
> The 
> > > four 
> > > > Maximals lower thier weapons to thier side awaiting Phobias 
> next 
> > > move.
> > > > 
> > > > "I'm coming out, please try to reserve judgement until later, 
I 
> > am 
> > > > here to help.
> > > > 
> > > > The cargo plank lowers and a bright light is emmited from the 
> > > inside 
> > > > of the craft. (I think the light thing is an unwritten rule 
of 
> > sci-
> > > fi-
> > > > it seems every ship does it.) As the plank touches the ground 
a 
> > > lone 
> > > > figure steps into view, Predicon emblem shining almost 
> tauntingly 
> > > at 
> > > > the center of his chest. "I am Phobia, and you are?"
> > > >

to

> > > > >

quickens

> > > > > activating his comm-link.
